entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, DIMINISHING TO AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
